audio_sermons.title: DEBATE on the Meaning of the Church in Reformation Thought
audio_sermons.description: Covers some of the most important (and often forgotten, in our day) aspects of the Reformation doctrine of the church (championed by Calvin, Knox, et al.). Includes many citations from Reformation leaders & confessional statements of the best Reformed churches. This is chapter 2 in Greg Barrow's The Covenanted Reformation Defended.

audio_sermons.title: DEBATE: Eschewing Ecclesiastical Tyranny (Protestant Biblical Separation)
audio_sermons.description: Classic Reformation teaching on separation, Protestant private judgment, the visible church, etc. -- contra Antichrist (the Papacy) & wayward liberal Protestants. This is appendix G from The Covenanted Reformation Defended.

audio_sermons.title: DEBATE: How the Solemn League & Covenant Binds the USA, Canada, Australia, etc., Today (1/3)
audio_sermons.description: The best modern defense of covenanting. Refutes Arminian objections to covenanting & shows why the Solemn League & Covenant still binds nations like the USA, Canada, Australia, etc. From chapter 3 of Greg Barrow’s book The Covenanted Reformation Defended.

audio_sermons.title: DEBATE: How the Solemn League & Covenant Binds the USA, Canada, Australia, etc., Today (2/3)

audio_sermons.title: DEBATE: Protestant Antidote to Modern Disunity (1/5) Protestant Fundamentals of Separation and Unity
audio_sermons.description: False ecumenism exposed! Debate on Reformation teaching about separation, the visible church, communion, etc. -- contra Antichrist (the Papacy) & wayward Protestants. Chapter 4 from The Covenanted Reformation Defended.
